TopicTitle: To celebrate my first MÃƒÂ¼n landing, I made a poster...

Articles.Content:
This is an absolutely amazing poster!

I'm liking the reference to the poster for the film 'Moon'.

Seriously, well done.

In a world dominated by Cowardly Space Travelers

One man will set the standard for bravery

From the creative genius of Felipe Falanghe comes a brand new space epic!

Join Jebediah Kerman, a simple man turned astronaut, as he looks under rocks, and asks for directions.

His possible downfall? An improperly staged spacecraft.

Join Jebediah Kerman in...

Mun

A film from 25th Century Squad directed by Felipe Falanghe

One Man:

One Solar System:

One Mission:

To have the wildest time of his life

Coming June 24, 2013

<><><><><><><><><><><><><>

How's that above for a Trailer Script

(To be read by Don LaFontaine or one of that crowd)
